headline: Top Stock Reports for Exxon Mobil, Lockheed Martin & Honeywell
summary: Exxon Mobil leads Zacks' top stock reports as strong production growth and asset strength help it outperform peers despite pressure from crude prices.

headline: These Industrials Lead Dow Jones Stocks Through January; Apple, Microsoft Lag
summary: Honeywell led the Dow industrials with a 16.6% gain in January, its best month since October 2022. Apple. and Microsoft lagged.
